document_data.name: ''Aeger's Hide''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aeger's Hide''''' was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] suit of [[hide armor|armor]] that was crafted from the hide of the fabled [[bear]] known as the [[Aeger]].
document_data.Powers: The armor possessed a ''+2 enchantment''. The wearer was immune to mind-altering effects that sought to [[confusion|confuse or befuddle]] individuals.
document_data.History:
Several centuries before the mid-1300s [[DR]], the Aeger was slain by a group of nearly two hundred militiamen. The armor was crafted some time thereafter.

At some point ''Aeger's Hide'' made its way into the possession of the [[Adventurer Mart]] in the city of [[Athkatla]].
